function_v0.doc:
Constructor

Initializes the contract.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `admin`: The address of the admin.
function_v0.name: __constructor

function_v0.doc:
Name

Gets the name of the contract.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.

# Returns
- `String`: The name of the contract.
function_v0.name: name

function_v0.doc:
Version

Gets the version of the contract.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.

# Returns
- `String`: The version of the contract.
function_v0.name: version

function_v0.doc:
Upgrade

Upgrades the contract.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `upgrader`: The address of the upgrader.
- `new_wasm_hash`: The hash of the new WASM.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the upgrade operation.
function_v0.name: upgrade

function_v0.doc:
Has Role

Checks if an account has a role.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `account`: The address of the account.
- `role`: The role to check.

# Returns
- `bool`: True if the account has the role, false otherwise.
function_v0.name: has_role

function_v0.doc:
Grant Role

Grants a role to an account.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `admin`: The address of the admin granting the role.
- `account`: The address of the account receiving the role.
- `role`: The role to be granted.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the grant operation.
function_v0.name: grant_role

function_v0.doc:
Revoke Role

Revokes a role from an account.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `admin`: The address of the admin revoking the role.
- `account`: The address of the account losing the role.
- `role`: The role to be revoked.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the revoke operation.
function_v0.name: revoke_role

function_v0.doc:
Get Invoices Count

Gets the total number of invoices.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.

# Returns
- `u128`: The total number of invoices.
function_v0.name: get_invoices_count

function_v0.doc:
Get Invoice

Gets an invoice by its ID.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `invoice_id`: The ID of the invoice.

# Returns
- `Result<Invoice, Error>`: The invoice or an error.
function_v0.name: get_invoice

function_v0.doc:
Get Invoice Token Config

Gets the invoice token config.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `token_id`: The address of the token.

# Returns
- `InvoiceTokenConfig`: The invoices config.
function_v0.name: get_invoice_token_config

function_v0.doc:
Set Invoice Token Config

Sets the invoice token config.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `admin`: The address of the admin setting the config.
- `token_id`: The address of the token.
- `min_amount`: The new minimum amount for invoices.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the set operation.
function_v0.name: set_invoice_token_config

function_v0.doc:
Remove Invoice Token Config

Removes the invoice token config.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `admin`: The address of the admin removing the config.
- `token_id`: The address of the token.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the remove operation.
function_v0.name: remove_invoice_token_config

function_v0.doc:
Send Invoice

Sends an invoice.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `sender`: The address of the sender.
- `token_id`: The address of the token.
- `amount`: The amount of the invoice.
- `managers`: A list of manager addresses controlling the invoice.
- `expiration_ledger`: The expiration ledger for approving the invoice.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The empty result or an error.
function_v0.name: send_invoice

function_v0.doc:
Refund Invoice

Refunds an invoice.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `invoice_id`: The ID of the invoice to be refunded.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the refund operation.
function_v0.name: refund_invoice

function_v0.doc:
Get Deals Count

Gets the total number of deals.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.

# Returns
- `u128`: The total number of deals.
function_v0.name: get_deals_count

function_v0.doc:
Get Deal

Gets a deal by its ID.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `deal_id`: The ID of the deal.

# Returns
- `Result<Deal, Error>`: The deal or an error.
function_v0.name: get_deal

function_v0.doc:
Create Deal

Creates a deal.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `deal_id`: The ID of the deal.
- `manager`: The address of the manager creating the deal.
- `type_`: The type of the deal.
- `metadata_uri`: The URI of the deal metadata.
- `metadata_hash`: The hash of the deal metadata.
- `invoice_ids`: A list of invoice IDs associated with the deal.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The empty result or an error.
function_v0.name: create_deal

function_v0.doc:
Update Deal

Updates a deal.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `deal_id`: The ID of the deal to be updated.
- `new_status`: The new status of the deal.
- `new_metadata_uri`: The new URI of the deal metadata.
- `new_metadata_hash`: The new hash of the deal metadata.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the update operation.
function_v0.name: update_deal

function_v0.doc:
Cancel Deal

Cancels a deal.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `deal_id`: The ID of the deal to be canceled.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the cancel operation.
function_v0.name: cancel_deal

function_v0.doc:
Payout Deal

Payouts a deal.

# Parameters
- `e`: The environment.
- `deal_id`: The ID of the deal to be paid out.
- `system_wallet`: The address of the system wallet.
- `system_fee_amount`: The system fee amount.
- `broker_wallet`: The address of the broker wallet.
- `broker_fee_amount`: The broker fee amount.
- `remaining_wallet`: The address of the remaining wallet.

# Returns
- `Result<(), Error>`: The result of the payout operation.
function_v0.name: payout_deal

udt_error_enum_v0.doc:
Error codes for the contract.

This enum represents various errors that can occur within the contract.
Each variant is associated with a unique error code.

Error codes are categorized as follows:
- 1xx: Existence Errors
- 2xx: Permission Errors
- 3xx: Validation Errors
udt_error_enum_v0.name: Error

cases.doc: The invoice token config was not found.
cases.name: InvoiceTokenConfigNotFound

cases.doc: The invoice token config min amount is invalid
cases.name: InvalidInvoiceTokenConfigMinAmount

cases.doc: The deal invoice IDs count is invalid.
cases.name: InvalidDealInvoiceIDsCount

cases.doc: The invoice managers count is invalid.
cases.name: InvalidInvoiceManagersCount

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when a role is granted to an account.

# Fields
- `account`: The address of the account receiving the role.
- `role`: The role being granted.
udt_struct_v0.name: GrantedRoleEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when a role is revoked from an account.

# Fields
- `account`: The address of the account losing the role.
- `role`: The role being revoked.
udt_struct_v0.name: RevokedRoleEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when an invoice is sent.

# Fields
- `id`: The ID of the sent invoice.
- `sender`: The address of the account that sent the invoice.
- `token_id`: The address of the token used for the invoice.
- `amount`: The amount of the invoice.
- `managers`: A list of manager addresses controlling the invoice.
udt_struct_v0.name: SentInvoiceEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when an invoice is refunded.

# Fields
- `id`: The ID of the refunded invoice.
udt_struct_v0.name: RefundedInvoiceEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc: \n# Fields\n- `id`: The ID of the paid invoice.
udt_struct_v0.name: PaidInvoiceEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when a deal is created.

# Fields
- `id`: The ID of the created deal.
- `type_`: The type of the created deal.
- `manager`: The address of the manager creating the deal.
- `metadata_hash`: The hash of the deal metadata.
- `invoice_ids`: A list of invoice IDs associated with the deal.
udt_struct_v0.name: CreatedDealEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when a deal is updated.

# Fields
- `id`: The ID of the updated deal.
- `status`: The new status of the deal.
- `metadata_hash`: The new hash of the deal metadata.
udt_struct_v0.name: UpdatedDealEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when a deal is cancelled.

# Fields
- `id`: The ID of the cancelled deal.
- `metadata_hash`: The final hash of the deal metadata.
udt_struct_v0.name: CancelledDealEventData

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Event emitted when a deal is paid.

# Fields
- `id`: The ID of the closed deal.
- `metadata_hash`: The final hash of the deal metadata.
udt_struct_v0.name: PaidDealEventData

udt_union_v0.doc:
DataKey enum used to define different types of data keys.

# Variants
- `Roles`: Represents a role data key.
- `Invoices`: Represents an invoice data key.
- `InvoicesCount`: Represents the count of invoices.
- `InvoiceTokenConfigs`: Represents an invoice token config data key.
- `Deals`: Represents a deal data key.
- `DealsCount`: Represents the count of deals.
udt_union_v0.name: DataKey

udt_struct_v0.doc:
RolesDataKey struct used to store role data.

# Fields
- `role`: The role assigned to the account.
- `account`: The address of the account.
udt_struct_v0.name: RolesDataKey

udt_union_v0.doc:
Role enum used to define different roles in the contract.

# Variants
- `Admin`: Represents the admin role.
- `Manager`: Represents the manager role.
- `Upgrader`: Represents the upgrader role.
udt_union_v0.name: Role

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Invoice struct used to define the structure of an invoice.

# Fields
- `status`: The current status of the invoice.
- `sender`: The address of the account that sent the invoice.
- `token_id`: The address of the token used for the invoice.
- `amount`: The amount of the invoice.
- `managers`: A list of manager addresses controlling the invoice.
udt_struct_v0.name: Invoice

udt_union_v0.doc:
InvoiceStatus enum used to define the possible statuses of an invoice.

# Variants
- `Sent`: The invoice has been sent.
- `Refunded`: The invoice has been refunded.
- `InProgress`: The invoice is in progress.
- `Paid`: The invoice has been paid.
udt_union_v0.name: InvoiceStatus

udt_struct_v0.doc:
InvoiceTokenConfig struct used to define the configuration of an invoice token.

# Fields
- `min_amount`: The minimum amount for an invoice.
udt_struct_v0.name: InvoiceTokenConfig

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Deal struct used to define the structure of a deal.

# Fields
- `type_`: The type of the deal.
- `status`: The current status of the deal.
- `metadata`: Metadata associated with the deal.
- `manager`: The address of the account managing the deal.
- `invoice_ids`: A list of invoice IDs associated with the deal.
udt_struct_v0.name: Deal

udt_union_v0.doc:
DealType enum used to define the possible types of deals.

# Variants
- `Tokens`: A deal involving tokens.
- `Funds`: A deal involving funds.
- `Logistics`: A deal involving logistics.
udt_union_v0.name: DealType

udt_union_v0.doc:
DealStatus enum used to define the possible statuses of a deal.

# Variants
- `Pending`: The deal is pending.
- `InTransit`: The deal is in transit.
- `Received`: The deal has been received.
- `Paid`: The deal has been paid (only for deal with invoices).
- `Cancelled`: The deal has been cancelled.
udt_union_v0.name: DealStatus

udt_struct_v0.doc:
DealMetadata struct used to define the metadata associated with a deal.

# Fields
- `uri`: The URI of the metadata.
- `hash`: The hash of the metadata.
udt_struct_v0.name: DealMetadata
